result.markdown: --- title: "Week 8: ARIMA models" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * AR, MA, ARMA and ARIMA models * Selecting model orders manually and automatically ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercise 1-4 from [Section 9.11 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima-exercises.html) ## Exercise solutions ## Pre-seminar activities Read [Sections 9.3-9.8 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Slides for seminar Download pdf ## Seminar activities 1. Explore the Egyptian exports series. Is data stationary? What ARIMA model? 2. Run through the code for the rest of the examples. Explore and understand what the code is doing. ## Seminar code ::: {.callout appearance="minimal"} [Seminar_code_week8.R](Seminar_code_week8.R){download="Seminar_code_week8.R"} ::: ## Assignments * [IA3](../assignments/A3.qmd) is due on Monday 28 April. * [GA3](../assignments/G3.qmd) is due on Monday 05 May.
